History of Changes

Version 3.13 (2015-09-25)

  • 58216 - provide picture-shape resize that maintains the aspect ratio
  • 57925 - Add a simple fix to avoid an NPE when Workbooks have invalid external references
  • 57915 - Fix Dev2Hex for numbers larger than Integer.MAX_VALUE and less than Integer.MIN_VALUE
  • 57890 - Add support for different datatypes in XSSFImportFromXML
  • 58207 - Provide user access to the original image dimensions
  • 58245 - Workbook support for iterating over Sheets
  • 58353 - Return correct value in Match-Function with match-type == -1
  • 58315 - Avoid NPE for RichTextString without font-details
  • 53275 - XSSFFont: reset indexed color flag when setting a non-indexed color
  • 58039 - Make DGet and DMin function implementations thread-safe
  • Fix DAYS360 handling for US/EU method
  • 58254 - CellFormatResult.text should check for nulls as per the javadoc
  • 58260 - Fix checks for limit on number of styles in XSSF/SXSSF, fix more than 32k styles in SXSSF workbooks
  • 58262 - ReadOnlySharedStringsTable now handles workbooks with an empty SST part
  • 52111 - Intersection formulae are now supported in XSSF
  • 58253 - CellReference upper-case check for #REF!, and javadoc improvements
  • 58252 - More CellReference unit testing coverage
  • 54938 - Throw InvalidFormatException as documented instead of IllegalArgumentException in WorkbookFactory.create()
  • 58237 - When adding a picture to a XWPF header or footer, attach it to the right part
  • 58220 - Improve the javadocs for XSSFFont and Font getFontHeight methods
  • 56479 - Don't hardcode dcterms as namespace alias in the attribute, but expect the actual alias that is used in the corresponding element
  • 56519 - XSLFSlide.draw is not working with text embeded in PPTX
  • 58205 - getSlideMasters() returns the master slides in the incorrect order
  • 57786 - XSLFFreeformShape ignores quadratic bezier curves
  • 58206 - provide a mechanism to find slide layouts by name
  • 58204 - STYLE: ShapeContainer interface makes internal getShapesList() redundant
  • 58190 - The current picture handling uses raw integers for types and index, replace with enum and reference
  • 58203 - Apparently Maven uses plurals for all artifacts except javadocs, so tweak our naming to make it happy
  • 58193 - Use input stream rather than byte array for checksum etc.
  • 58200 - SXSSF support for evaluating formula cells, provided the cell and all its references are within the current window
  • 58098 - Avoid NPE in cleanup if NPOIFSFileSystem is opened on a locked File under Windows
  • Merged common_sl branch to trunk
  • 57571 - Fix creating comments for XSSF/SXSSF, regression was introduced via bug 54920
  • 58175 - Fix creating comments for XSSF/SXSSF, regression was introduced via bug 54920
  • 58156 - Possible data corruption in hasPOIFSHeader and hasOOXMLHeader
  • 57484 - Allow processing of non-OOXML core namespace packages
  • 58130 - Conditional Formatting support for DataBars, Icon Sets / Multi-States, and Color Scales

Version 3.13-beta1 (2015-07-23)

  • 56791 - The default POIFS implementation has been switched to NPOIFS. If you request a POIFSFileSystem, you will now get a NPOIFSFileSystem-based one. OPOIFSFileSystem remains for those who still want the old implementation
  • 58138 - Conditional Formatting support for the common Color class, in addition to previous color shorts
  • 58133 - Agile encryption - wrong checksum calculation
  • 58113 - Regression: NullPointerException when setting cell value to null
  • 57893 - Add a method for obtaining all merged regions on a worksheet. This is faster for XSSFSheet than obtaining each individually by iteration.
  • 58036 - Add basic support for VBA macro-enabled workbooks (xlsm)
  • 57744 - Fix parsing the email submission data when id contains a hyphen
  • 57678 - Better handle years in mail-messages between 1980 and 1999
  • 54332 - WMF extraction failing in Tika for older PowerPoint Files
  • 56865 - Limit number of bytes (by counting them) while opening office docs
  • 50090 - zip bomb prevention
  • 58069 - Biff8RC4 xorShort returns wrong value for unsigned shorts
  • 56420 - Fix possible NullPointerException when empty cell is included in Sumif calculation
  • 58040 - Log Forging
  • 56328 - Improve AreaReference to take account of the spreadsheet format version when determining whether a reference is whole-column.
  • 57963 - Fix and verify in CI builds that we can compile most examples without requiring scratchpad-jar, update documentation.
  • 53109 - Correctly handle unicode strings in NameCommentRecord
  • 57904 - Automatically verify that the resulting source-packages can be built
  • 57512 - Fix potential NPE in DateUtil for invalid dates
  • 57889 - Fix potential NPE in XWPFParagraph.getNumFmt()
  • 57951 - Use BigDecimal in some cases in DataFormatter.formatRawCellContents, to avoid rounding problems on JDK8
  • 55410 - Use specific ID value which prevents Excel from turning comments into giant curved arrows

Version 3.12 (2015-05-11)

  • Initial XWPFStyles support for working with default document paragraph and run styles
  • If an empty file or stream is given to WorkbookFactory.create, give a more informative exception - EmptyFileException
  • 57552 - Sort PackagePart returns from OPCPackage by name considering numbers in filenames, so Image10.png comes after Image9.png, fixing problems with XSLF adding 10+ images to a slide
  • 57880 - Handle >32,767 cell styles and formats in XSSF (file format limit is 64,000)
  • 57593 - Allow WorkbookFactory.create methods to open xlsx files protected with the default password
  • 57593 - Add overloaded WorkbookFactory.create methods which take the spreadsheet password
  • 57666 - When removing a SXSSF sheet, ensure temp files associated with it are disposed of
  • 57826 - If a XSSF shape has a buFont but no bullet character, mirror Excel and treat as un-bulleted
  • 57642 - Fix setSheetName with ISERROR on XSSF
  • 57747 - Add ISERR() function
  • 57829 - Avoid XmlValueDisconnectedException when removing a XWPFRun from a XWPFParagraph by removing from IRuns as well
  • 57851 - Skip null properties in PropertyTableBase, which is how PropertyFactory reports unsupported POIFS properties
  • 57820 - Avoid NPE on HSLF Tables with a top position of -1
  • 56579 - Throw exception if max string length of 32767 chars is exceeded in XSSF and SXSSF.
  • 55386 - Fix handling of bold formatting in example application 'ToHtml'
  • 47304 - Use fixed encoding when extracting text in WordDocument
  • 56017 - Fix shifting comments with shifted rows
  • 56295 - Fix cloning of styles across workbooks and handling of default value of attribute applyFill
  • 56380 - Remove limitation of 1024 comments per Workbook
  • 56467 - Fix cloning of sheets with pictures
  • More helpful ExtractorFactory exception if given a Visio VSDX ooxml file
  • 56799 - Include CTTblGrid in the smaller poi-ooxml-schemas jar
  • 57165 - Avoid PartAlreadyExistsException when removing/cloning sheets
  • 56893 - Additional check for supported string-length to avoid creating broken XLS files later one
  • When saving an OPCPackage with no Core Properties (eg from Jasper Reports), ensure they are always added even if not yet used
  • github-18 - Handle documents with a picture-only header
  • 57622 - Change from XMLEventFactory.newFactory to XMLEventFactory.newInstance, for IBM JDK Compatibility

Version 3.12-beta1 (2015-02-28)

  • 57459 - Add method in SXSSFSheet to directly set row OutLineLevel
  • 57456 - Add workaround to read empty SSTRecord where Excel puts random number in unique-strings-count-field
  • 57535 - Add POI-specific error codes to FormulaError
  • Start on common interfaces for Paragraphs and Character Runs for HWPF and XWPF
  • Double Strikethrough support for XWPF runs, along the lines of the HWPF support

  • XSSFSheet support for getDrawingPatriarch(), alongside the existing createDrawingPatriarch() method
  • TIKA-1515 - Handle Excel 3 files with a 0x8001 codepage
  • 53453 - Add methods to set margins in sections of HWPF documents
  • 46898 - XSSF: Return #VALUE! for circular references.
  • 46192 - Add methods to query outline level for HSSF and XSSF

  • Support for Office Binary Document RC4 CryptoAPI Encryption for HSLF

  • 57373 - Fix get/setFirstVisibleTab() for XSSFWorkbook
  • 57362 - Properly initialize chart-axis datastructure when loading a spreadsheet which already contains one.
  • 56511 - Fix NullPointerException for RichText strings with no formatting for some runs.
  • 56550 - Avoid IBM JDK fail immediately during loading some POI classes, note: IBM JDK 1.7 or higher is needed because of XML APIs.
  • 56595 - Switch the cache in DateUtil.isADateFormat() to ThreadLocals to not have another syncpoint here.
  • 56644 - NullPointerException in XSSFCell Constructor with different MissingCellPolicy
  • 56888 - XSSFDataValidation ignores "allow blank" read from sheet, assumes true
  • 57171 - Adjust the active sheet in setSheetOrder()
  • 57163 - Adjust the active sheet in removeSheet()
  • 57231 - Add missing ArrayRecord.clone()
  • Expose the version information from OldExcelExtractor
  • 57071 - 3+ XSSF column label names for pivot tables
  • 57063 - XSSF custom column label names for pivot tables
  • 57254 - XWPF: Correctly build internal list of styles when styles are added
  • 57312 - XWPF: Add check for null value of underline w:val

Version 3.11-beta2 (2014-08-22)

  • Recommended Apache XMLBeans version increased to 2.6.0 (any version from 2.3.0 or later will work though)
  • 56800 - Provide a helpful exception, XLSBUnsupportedException, if XSSFWorkbook is passed a .xlsb file
  • 56814 - Switch from dom4j to JAXP

Version 2.0-pre3 (2003-07-29)

  • HPSF is now able to read properties which are given in the property set stream but which don't have a value ("variant" type VT_EMPTY). The getXXX() methods of the PropertySet class return null if their return type is a reference (like a string) or 0 if the return type is numeric. Details about the return types and about how to distinguish between a property value of zero and a property value that is not present can be found in the API documentation.
  • Gridlines can now be turned on and off
  • NamePTG refactoring/fixes
  • minor fixes to ExternSheet and formula strings
  • Sheet comparisons now ignore case

Version 2.0-pre2 (2003-07-06)

  • A nasty concurrency problem has been fixed. Any users working in a multithreaded environment should seriously consider upgrading to this release.
  • The EXTSST record has been implemented. This record is used by excel for optimized reading of strings.
  • When rows are shifted, the merged regions now move with them. If a row contains 2 merged cells, the resulting shifted row should have those cells merged as well.
  • There were some issues when removing merged regions (specifically, removing all of them and then adding some more) and have been resolved.
  • When a sheet contained shared formulas (when a formula is dragged across greater than 6 cells), the clone would fail. We now support cloning of sheets that contain this Excel optimization.
  • Support added for reading formulas with UnaryPlus and UnaryMinus operators.

Version 2.0-pre1 (2003-05-17)

  • Patch applied for deep cloning of worksheets was provided
  • Patch applied to allow sheet reordering
  • Added additional print area setting methods using row/column numbers
  • HDF: Negative Array size fix
  • Added argument pointers to support the IF formula
  • Formulas: Added special character support for string literals, specifically for SUMIF formula support and addresses a bug as well
  • BlockingInputStream committed to help ensure reads
  • Fixed problem with NaN values differing from the investigated value from file reads in FormulaRecords
  • Patch for getColumnWidth in HSSF
  • Patch for dealing with mult-level numbered lists in HDF
  • Due to named reference work, several named-ranged bugs were closed
  • Patch applied to prevent sheet corruption after a template modification
  • Shared Formulas now Supported
  • Added GreaterEqual, LessEqual and NotEqual to Formula Parser
  • Added GreaterThan and LessThan functionality to formulas
  • Patches for i10n
  • POI Build System Updated
  • font names can now be null

Version 1.0.1 (2002-01-04)

  • Changes not recorded.

Version 1.0.0 (2001-12-30)

  • Minor documentation updates.

Version 0.14.0 (2001-12-22)

  • Added DataFormat helper class and exposed set and get format on HSSFCellStyle
  • Fixed column width apis (unit wise) and various javadoc on the subject
  • Fix for Dimensions record (again)... (one of these days I'll write a unit test for this ;-p).
  • Some optimization on sheet creation.

Version 0.13.0 (2001-12-16)

  • Changes not recorded.

Version 0.12.0 (2001-12-12)

  • Added MulBlank, Blank, ColInfo
  • Added log4j facility and removed all sys.out type logging
  • Added support for adding font's, styles and corresponding high level api for styling cells
  • added support for changing row height, cell width and default row height/cell width.
  • Added fixes for internationalization (UTF-16 should work now from HSSFCell.setStringValue, etc when the encoding is set)
  • added support for adding/removing and naming sheets.

Version 0.11.0 (2001-12-08)

  • Bugfix release. We were throwing an exception when reading RKRecord objects.

Version 0.10.0 (2001-12-02)

  • Got continuation records to work (read/write)
  • Added various pre-support for formulas
  • Massive API reorganization, repackaging.
  • BiffViewer class added for validating HSSF & POI and/or HSSF Output.
  • Better API support for modification.

Version 0.7 (and interim releases) (2001-11-17)

  • Added encoding flag to high and low level api to use utf-16 when needed (HSSFCell.setEncoding())
  • added read only support for Label records (which are reinterpreted as LabelSST when written)
  • Broken continuation record implementation (oops)
  • BiffViewer class added for validating HSSF & POI and/or HSSF Output.

Version 0.6 (2001-11-11)

  • Support for read/write and modify.
  • Read only support for MulRK records (converted to Number when writing)

Version 0.5 (2001-11-05)

  • Changes not recorded.

  • Changes not recorded.

  • Changes not recorded.
